 IDEAS:

 \074tal:block metal:define-macro="master"\076
 \074tal:block tal:define="global_definitions_macros here/global_definitions/macros;
 subject_list subject_list | python:here.getProperty('subject_list', []) or []"\076
 \074tal:block metal:use-macro="global_definitions_macros/header_definitions" /\076
 \074!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"\076
 \074html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xml:lang="en" lang="en"\076
 \074head\076
 \074base tal:attributes="href python: '%s/' % (url, )" /\076
 \074meta name="generator" content="ERP5 - Copyright (C) 2001 - 2008. All rights reserved." /\076
 \074meta name="description" content=""
 tal:attributes="content description | title | string:ERP5 Free Open Source ERP and CRM" /\076
 \074meta name="keywords" content=""
 tal:attributes="content python:', '.join(subject_list)" /\076
 \074meta name="robots" content="index, follow" /\076
 \074meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" /\076
 \074meta http-equiv="Content-Script-Type" content="text/javascript" /\076
 \074meta http-equiv="Content-Style-Type" content="text/css" /\076
 \074title tal:define="title title | string:ERP5;
 header_title header_title | nothing"
 tal:content="python:header_title or '%s | %s' % (title, here.getPortalObject().title_or_id())"\076\074/title\076
 \074tal:block tal:repeat="css css_list"\076
 \074link tal:attributes="href css" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" /\076
 \074/tal:block\076
 \074tal:block tal:replace="nothing"\076
 \074!-- Render each field's css and javascript. --\076
 \074/tal:block\076
 \074tal:block tal:condition="python: form is not None"\076
 \074tal:block tal:repeat="group python: [x for x in form.get_groups(include_empty=0) if x != 'hidden']"\076
 \074tal:block tal:repeat="field python: form.get_fields_in_group(group)"\076
 \074tal:block tal:define="css python: field.render_css(REQUEST=request)"\076
 \074style tal:condition="python: css is not None"
 tal:content="css"
 tal:attributes="type python:'text/css'"\076
 \074/style\076
 \074/tal:block\076
 \074tal:block tal:define="dummy python: js_list.extend(field.get_javascript_list(REQUEST=request))" /\076
 \074/tal:block\076
 \074/tal:block\076
 \074/tal:block\076
 \074tal:block tal:repeat="js js_list"\076
